mapper.update: update unity_user set password=#{password} where username=#{username}
mapper.select: select role_id from unity_user_role where username=#{username}
select api_url from unity_system_api where api_id in(select api_id from unity_role_api where role_id =#{roleId} )

SELECT t1.role_id, t1.website_id, CONCAT( GROUP_CONCAT('"', t2.api_url SEPARATOR '", '), '"') AS url FROM unity_role_api AS t1 JOIN unity_system_api AS t2 ON t1.api_id = t2.api_id GROUP BY t1.role_id, t1.website_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM unity_department WHERE department_id =#{departmentId};
